content: उल्लिख् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To scratch, cut up, scrape, tear or rip up, scarify; जलदसंहतिमुल्लिखंत्यः <ls>Śi. 5. 20</ls>; <ls>K. 30</ls>; to furrow (as ground); <ls>Mv. 1. 20.</ls> {@--2@} To rub or grind against; विषाणोल्लिखितस्कंधं <ls>H. 3. 146</ls>; <ls>K. 14.</ls> {@--3@} To grind down; polish; संस्कारोल्लिखितो महामणिः <ls>Ś. 6. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 32</ls>; त्वष्टा विवस्वतमिवोल्लिलेख <ls>Ki. 17. 48.</ls> {@--4@} To carve. {@--5@} To paint, write, draw in a picture; <ls>Ku. 5. 58.</ls> {@--6@} To bear, raise.
